Please continue to watch for possible symptoms and exercise appropriate precautions while interacting with others.
","stringId":"stringId_8c056b1aa3872bb2"},{"id":"42ba27cdb70f-f0fbcd1629a1880a-863c","type":"statement","designer":{"xLocation":780,"yLocation":80},"text":"It is possible that you may have a severe acute illness or a serious complication.  

It is strongly recommended that you make your way to the nearest Emergency Room.","stringId":"stringId_0c14891087c18a1a","layout":"vertical","label":"ER"},{"id":"c69bea542efb-a54efa6b31999292-cb0a","type":"beginScenario","designer":{"xLocation":180,"yLocation":408},"scenario":"/healthnavigator","args":"${complaint},
${age}","variable":"output"},{"id":"694030df8911-8de34faa3f192794-9422","type":"action","label":"Action","designer":{"xLocation":292,"yLocation":200,"next":"66ef89d3be71-9b1dc03399205022-c76f"},"onInit":"/*
 * Use the following variable notation:
 * 
 * scenario.var = scenario local variables
 * user.var = user data variables
 * conversation.var = global conversation variables
 * 
 * Available object to use in the code:
 * require, session, moment, builder, next(), underscore
 * 
 * Hit 'Ctrl + Space' for autocomplete
 * 
 * Example: scenario.welcomeMessage = "Hello " + scenario.name
*/

${age} = ${scenarioArgs}.Age

if (scenario.difficulty_breathing.index === 0)
    { ${complaint} = "Difficulty Breathing",
    scenario.ros = true;}
else if (scenario.cough.index === 0)
    { ${complaint} = "Cough",
    scenario.ros = true;}
else if (scenario.cold_symptoms.index === 0)
    { ${complaint} = "Cold Symptoms",
    scenario.ros = true;}
else
    { ${complaint} = " ",
    scenario.ros = false;}

${Text} = 'Here is what we have collected thus far '
${QuestionnaireSummary} = 
'\n ' +
'\n Name: ' + ${scenarioArgs}.First + ' ' + ${scenarioArgs}.Last +
'\n Age: '+ ${scenarioArgs}.Age +
'\n Difficulty in Breathing: ' + ${difficulty_breathing}.entity +
'\n Have Developed a Cough: ' + ${cough}.entity +
'\n Have Developed other Cold Symptoms: ' + ${cold_symptoms}.entity +
'\n Traveled to an at risk location recently: ' + ${travel}.entity +
'\n Had direct contact with person with or suspected to have Covid 19: ' + ${exposure}.entity"},{"id":"562c61c40986-2fefd53f4c48e9ba-3294","type":"statement","designer":{"xLocation":100,"yLocation":354,"next":"3806a060832f-8fcb777dc7cf6b27-c4c4"},"text":"Although you may have traveled, your lack of known close contact with someone who has or is suspected of having the Coronavirus (or the time since that contact), indicates that your symptoms are highly likely to be unrelated to the Coronavirus.

Thank you for completing the Covid19 Bot.  

For the most up to date information on the Coronavirus, please check out https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-nCoV/summary.html

At this time, I'm going to pass you off to the Review of Symptoms Triage Bot for further triage of your symptoms.","layout":"vertical","attachment":[{"type":"HeroCard","title":"${Text}","titleStringId":"stringId_553d94138f79c0a1","subtitle":"${QuestionnaireSummary}","subtitleStringId":"stringId_0eb4ef1d0b7009b4","image":""}],"stringId":"stringId_474b29852199e08d"},{"id":"1a8efdad6ee8-f997bcce875b5371-a89b","type":"statement","designer":{"xLocation":300,"yLocation":20},"text":"Since you indicated that you are having severe difficulty breathing, please call 911 immediately.","stringId":"stringId_c017d4893059d87c","label":"Call 911"},{"id":"89b241484987-b1c702400ef9f004-6bef","type":"action","label":"Action","designer":{"xLocation":860,"yLocation":192,"next":"266845b9a59c-5646cb3394992696-c73f"},"onInit":"/*

*/
${Text} = 'Triage Nurse Follow Up is Required'
${QuestionnaireSummary} = 
'Justification - Although the patient has traveled recetnly, the patient is asymptomatic and has no known definite exposure' +
'\n  However, patient could still develop symptoms and their workplace may prefer patient to stay/work at home.' +
'\n  ' +
'\n Urgency: By End of Day' +
'\n ' +
'\n Name: ' + ${scenarioArgs}.First + ' ' + ${scenarioArgs}.Last +

'\n Difficulty in Breathing: ' + ${difficulty_breathing}.entity +
'\n Cough : ' + ${cough}.entity +

 * Use the following variable notation:
 * 
 * scenario.var = scenario local variables
 * user.var = user data variables
 * conversation.var = global conversation variables
 * 
 * Available object to use in the code:
 * require, session, moment, builder, next(), underscore
 * 
 * Hit 'Ctrl + Space' for autocomplete
 * 
 * Example: scenario.welcomeMessage = "Hello " + scenario.name
*/

if ((scenario.risk_difficulty_breathing.index === 0) || (scenario.risk_very_sick.index === 0))
    {scenario.er = true;}

else
    {scenario.er = false;}"},{"id":"9ef291c4e0cb-0eb4a2b7443cbc40-8a93","type":"branch","condition":"scenario.er == true","designer":{"xLocation":680,"yLocation":80,"next":"a55e27d19c9f-4ba6f5c5cb657d1d-7bdc"},"targetStepId":"42ba27cdb70f-f0fbcd1629a1880a-863c"},{"id":"a55e27d19c9f-4ba6f5c5cb657d1d-7bdc","type":"prompt","dataType":"session.getCustomLocalizedValue("stringId_ebf738fc930541b0")","designer":{"xLocation":520,"yLocation":160,"next":"cdf872e321ab-66d4b6cd5a662eac-f7ce","listStyle":3},"text":"Do you have a fever (> 100.4 F) or are you feeling feverish?","variable":"risk_fever","stringId":"stringId_e1e998032a3aa666","label":"Fever","choiceType":"choice"},{"id":"cdf872e321ab-66d4b6cd5a662eac-f7ce","type":"action","label":"Action","designer":{"xLocation":633,"yLocation":168,"next":"daaa654139e8-1cb7093cf4a703ef-85a5"},"onInit":"/*
 * Use the following variable notation:

 * Available object to use in the code:
 * require, session, moment, builder, next(), underscore
 * 
 * Hit 'Ctrl + Space' for autocomplete
 * 
 * Example: scenario.welcomeMessage = "Hello " + scenario.name
*/

if ((scenario.risk_fever.index === 0) && ((scenario.travel.index === 0) || (scenario.travel.index === 1)))
    {scenario.fever = true;}

else
    {scenario.fever = false;}

/*

* Note:  Need to evaluate Triage Protocols to determine if different logic should be used

*/"},{"id":"485b9fbab37b-ddeb55de0e7abd21-7ed7","type":"prompt","dataType":"session.getCustomLocalizedValue("stringId_ebf738fc930541b0")","designer":{"xLocation":511,"yLocation":249,"next":"5021e193a8aa-00855188e26b9662-063c","listStyle":3},"text":"Has a cough developed?","variable":"risk_cough","stringId":"stringId_a7aad92f52b3a6f0","label":"Cough","choiceType":"choice"},{"id":"5021e193a8aa-00855188e26b9662-063c","type":"action","label":"Action","designer":{"xLocation":633,"yLocation":240,"next":"4085d99b02bb-07136d9225e87389-e122"},"onInit":"/*

"},{"id":"4085d99b02bb-07136d9225e87389-e122","type":"branch","condition":"scenario.cough == true","designer":{"xLocation":753,"yLocation":260,"next":"069709d209d8-53b40d554b61c10b-04fe"},"targetStepId":"b8931e59579b-f3baff7f354d21f2-05c7","label":"Cough"},{"id":"069709d209d8-53b40d554b61c10b-04fe","type":"prompt","dataType":"session.getCustomLocalizedValue("stringId_ebf738fc930541b0")","designer":{"xLocation":510,"yLocation":340,"next":"d99a341353d9-3ee4652d0edb4450-3f07","listStyle":3},"text":"Are you experiencing any of the following symptoms; Body aches, Chills, Diarrhea, Headache, Runny Nose, or Sore Throat?","variable":"risk_cold_symptoms","stringId":"stringId_1aaadfd6505a149b","label":"Cold Symptoms","choiceType":"choice"},{"id":"d99a341353d9-3ee4652d0edb4450-3f07","type":"action","label":"Action","designer":{"xLocation":633,"yLocation":320,"next":"c700b00e2f5d-a79092db5c6a7a00-e742"},"onInit":"/*
